# Interface SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface

Interface for configuring postprocessing settings for speech synthesis.

interface SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface {  
sampleRate?: number;  
trimSilence?: boolean;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

sampleRate? trimSilence?

## Properties

### `Optional`sampleRate

sampleRate?: number

The sample rate for the speech synthesis.

### `Optional`trimSilence

trimSilence?: boolean

Whether to trim silence.

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
